attributes.action: immediately ban the travel costs of family members of members of the House of Commons and the House of Lords being paid for by the taxpayer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Travel of families is NOT job related.  Expenses and allowances funded by the taxpayer should be ENTIRELY job related.  If they are not they should not be paid by the taxpayer.  This is almost as bad as getting the taxpayer to pay for these people's groceries.  Immoral!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
